revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Option |model=GlobeSurfer |revision=III |upc= |ean= |asin=B0061SQF2C,B00266Z9F2 |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=01/29/2009 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=3G mobile router |fcc_id=NCMOGS0312 |ic_id=2734A-GS0312 |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM5354;BCM5354KFBG, HK0819, P13, 869424, R2; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K8P5516UZB-EI4E |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Qimonda |ram1_model=HYB25DC256160CF |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe (USB) |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM5354;BCM5354KFBG, HK0819, P13, 869424, R2; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2528L;SiGe, 2528L, 8042M;1; |flags=LCD display,analogue phone port, |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux;OpenRG; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=GlobeSurfer |default_ssid_regex=^GlobeSurfer$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:0C:E3 |oui_eth=00:0C:E3 }} {{TagLine|Option GlobeSurfer III GSM/HSPA Router}} :[http://www.option.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/95_Z08.209_UG_GSIII_a4_V3_HR_NC.pdf User guide] {{SupportPage|http://www.option.com/product/globesurfer-iii-2/}} :[http://www.option.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/96_GlobeSurfer-III-Reference-Manual-20120305.pdf Technical reference manual]
*[http://www.globesurfer.co.uk/globesurfer/Globesurfer_3_Plus.html Globesurfer 3 Plus] Has an LCD display, can be powered via USB port. :The miniPCIe slot is data only for use with included GTM382 3G module. :The default SSID is per the sample label affixed to the EUT in the FCC docs.
===Additional external links=== [http://pastebin.com/6giaS71U OpenWRT Bootlog] :[http://forum.pcekspert.com/showpost.php?p=2450564&postcount=8 Unofficial OpenWRT build/flashing tutorial] :[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=33250 Additional OpenWRT informations and discussion]
===Used PSU=== {{hasPowerSupply |brand=PHIHONG |model=PSA15R-050P |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.5 |input_hz=50-60 |input_c=AC |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=5 |output_a=3 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |output_OD=5.5 |output_ID=2.1 }}
